title: Twitchy Witchy Rhymes: and Other Ghostly Goings-on for Kids
description: The Witches! The Ghouls! The Zombies.These are the things that scare.If you think you can handle these beings.Look inside this book...if you dare.Inside you will find all things spooky.In there just to give you a fright.Now I ask you take heed in what I say.DO NOT READ ALONE AT NIGHT.
author: Ann Perry
